column6: - The explosive conclusion of the first arc of X-FORCE! - The unthinkable has occurred! One of the team is dead and the others are held captive by their newest foe: the swaggering oligarch VOLGA. - Struggling to save their own lives, X-Force's secrets come to light as they use everything in their arsenal to survive. - But when the dust settles, will these revealed truths ultimately tear them apart?
